name: Gowtham Kaki
body:
I am a PhD student in Programming Languages at [Purdue CS](http://cs.purdue.edu). My advisor is [Prof. Suresh Jagannathan](https://www.cs.purdue.edu/homes/suresh). The focus of my work is on constructing automated verification procedures for higher-order programs. My research interests lie in type systems, static analysis and automated theorem proving.

Before starting my PhD I was a front-end engineer at [Yahoo! SDC, Bangalore, India](http://in.yahoo.com/). I graduated with B.E in Computer Science from [BITS, Pilani, India](http://csis.bits-pilani.ac.in/) in 2009.

### Talks and Publications
